alert.note: Alert for Merced - Madera - Mendota (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 29 at 4:42PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Merced County through 515 PM PDT... At 441 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southwest of Atwater, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph, pea size hail and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Merced, Atwater, Livingston and Winton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
